description: "The residency of Preanger (Parahyangan), West Java, with plantations (coconut, coffee, tea, cinchona (‘kina’), betel, teakwood, bamboo) and crops (rice, sugarcane, alang-alang). Two inset maps: a triangulation map, and a map of land route distances."
title: "Topographische kaart van de residentie Preanger regentschappen opgenomen ingevolge gouvernements besluit van den 28n. september 1871 No. 28, in de jaren 1871-1886"
